'''Spark Universe''' is a game development and animation studio, responsible for developing many add-ons and maps for the [[Marketplace]]. Among their work, they are known for making many releases promoting {{AMCM}}. They also jointly created the resource pack for the [[A Minecraft Movie Live Event|''A Minecraft Movie'' Live Event]], along with Mojang.

== Trivia ==

* Several of the studio's projects have been directly sponsored by [[Mojang Studios]].
** [[Realms Plus]] included Planes, Lucky Block: Summer,<ref>{{Mcnet|realms-plus-september|Realms Plus: September|September 7, 2021|Sofia Dankis}}</ref> Zombies,<ref>{{Mcnet|realms-plus-april-2022|Realms Plus: April|April 7, 2022|Sophie Austin}}</ref> Monsters++,<ref>{{Mcnet|realms-plus-august-2022|Realms Plus: August|August 4, 2022|Sophie Austin}}</ref> and Lucky Blocks.<ref>{{Mcnet|realms-plus-march-2023|Realms Plus: March 2023|March 8, 2023|Sophie Austin}}</ref>
** [[Marketplace Pass]] included InsaneCraft Pack 1.6,<ref>{{Mcnet|april-2024-marketplace-content|April 2024: Marketplace content|April 2, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref> Spark Portals,<ref>{{Mcnet|marketplace-content-may-2024|MARKETPLACE CONTENT: MAY 2024|May 7, 2024|Linn Viberg}}</ref> and the [[Character Creator|character creator]] items Flame Samurai Chest<ref>{{Mcnet|marketplace-content-november-2024|Marketplace Content: November 2024|November 6, 2024|Julius Olofsson}}</ref> and Dark Monster Mask.<ref>{{Mcnet|marketplace-content-january-2025|Marketplace Content: January 2025|January 7, 2025|Julius Olofsson}}</ref>
* Their map Realism Craft was used to promote the introduction of [[dynamic worlds]],<ref name=":0" /> even receiving a special Marketplace button.
